item.title: [PI]help displaying message of day SIMPLE
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

I don’t know how to make it display message of the day for when people login i know how to display a message (client.java) but I don’t know how to make it display the message of the day. I guess I could change it each day but umm idk lol I just want to know how to do it this way…
my playerassistant.java is where the message of the day public void is
heres what it looks like:

    public void messageOfTheDay(){
        for(int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++){
        //    Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; 
            int tipID = 0+Misc.random(15);
            if(tipID == 0){
            c.sendMessage("Want awesome rewards?@blu@Donate at@bla@www._.com"); // i made this blank so no one on this forums considers it "advertising" It's only blank on here not my server..           
            return;
            }
            if(tipID == 1){
            c.sendMessage("Did you know? Belhelmiel is the founder of this server.");    
            return;
            }
            if(tipID == 2){
            c.sendMessage("Did you know?: You can donate and get free items, and more, see forums.");    
            return;
            }
            if(tipID == 3){
            c.sendMessage("Vote @blu@every 12 hours@bla@' to help the server grow!");    
            return;
            }
            if(tipID == 4){
            c.sendMessage("Did you know? You can change your game frame by going into settings!");    
            return;
            }
            if(tipID == 5){
            c.sendMessage("Did you know? @blu@_@bla@ is Co-Owner.");    
            return;
            }
            if(tipID == 6){
            c.sendMessage("Did you know@blu@_@bla@ is head admin.");    
            return;
            }
            if(tipID == 7){
            c.sendMessage("Asking for staff will lower your chance of receiving it");    
            return;
            }
            if(tipID == 8){
            c.sendMessage("Did you know? You can use '@blu@::yell@bla@' even if your a normal player (temporary).");    
            return;
            }
            if(tipID == 9){
            c.sendMessage("Did you know? Saying noob is not counted as flaming.");    
            return;
            }
            if(tipID == 10){
            c.sendMessage("Did you know? Farcasting is impossible on this server.");    
            return;
            }
        }
    }

well help!
